detail_desc: 5-pocket, low-rise, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with worn details, a zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Made using Lycra® Beauty technology to retain the shape of the jeans and provide a sculpting effect with optimal comfort.

Set with a hooded jacket and pair of joggers in sweatshirt fabric and a T-shirt in jersey. Jacket with a jersey-lined hood, print motif on the front, and zip down the front with a chin guard. Joggers with wide elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, a print motif on the front, pockets in the side seams,a back pocket and ribbed hems. T-shirt with a round neck and a print motif on the front.

Set with a hooded jacket and pair of joggers in sweatshirt fabric and a T-shirt in jersey. Jacket with a jersey-lined hood, print motif on the front, and zip down the front with a chin guard. Joggers with wide elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, a print motif on the front, pockets in the side seams,a back pocket and ribbed hems. T-shirt with a round neck and a print motif on the front.

Set with a hat, pair of mittens and tube scarf in a soft, double-layered fine knit. Hat with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens (size 0-6M without thumbs) with foldover ribbing at the cuffs.

Set with a hat, pair of mittens and tube scarf in a soft, double-layered fine knit. Hat with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens (size 0-6M without thumbs) with foldover ribbing at the cuffs.
PREMIUM QUALITY. Trousers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with wide elasticated ribbing at the waist and straight, wide legs with roll-edge hems.
PREMIUM QUALITY. Trousers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with wide elasticated ribbing at the waist and straight, wide legs with roll-edge hems.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined, faux fur-trimmed hood. Taped zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets with a taped zip, and elastication at the back of the waist, cuffs and hems. Reinforced at the back and legs, and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Folded seams and reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined, faux fur-trimmed hood. Taped zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets with a taped zip, and elastication at the back of the waist, cuffs and hems. Reinforced at the back and legs, and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Folded seams and reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined, faux fur-trimmed hood. Taped zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets with a taped zip, and elastication at the back of the waist, cuffs and hems. Reinforced at the back and legs, and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Folded seams and reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Hat in braided paper straw containing glittery threads with a band of embroidered flowers. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace details, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace details, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with lace and mesh details and removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Ballet pumps in shimmering imitation leather with a grosgrain trim around the opening. Satin linings and insoles and finely fluted soles.
Ballet pumps in shimmering imitation leather with a grosgrain trim around the opening. Satin linings and insoles and finely fluted soles.
Balaclava knitted in a soft cotton blend with decorative ears on the top. Fleece lining.

Top in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back. Lace trim around the front of the neckline and slits in the sides of the hem.
Long earrings in embossed metal. Length 6 cm.

Set with a bodysuit, pair of shorts and hat in soft, printed organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders, short sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Shorts with an elasticated waist. Hat with a sewn-in turn-up.

Set with a bodysuit, pair of shorts and hat in soft, printed organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders, short sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Shorts with an elasticated waist. Hat with a sewn-in turn-up.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in a patterned weave with a high waist with covered elastication. Lined.

Boiler suit in washed, organic cotton denim with short sleeves, a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets, side pockets, back pockets and a detachable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Wide, ankle-length legs.
Turban in a soft rib knit.
Turban in a soft rib knit.
Knee-length skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist, belt and metal buckle. Buttons down the front, side pockets and back pockets. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.

Shorts woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend containing some cotton. High, pleated paper bag waist, a detachable tie belt, zip fly, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Tuxedo trousers in twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and satin side stripes.
Pool shoes in imitation leather with a print motif. Moulded insoles and patterned ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

Plumeti-patterned blouse in an airy viscose weave with a small frill over the shoulders, a lace-trimmed collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top with decorative gathers, and long sleeves with a frill trim and a button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Boxy top in jersey crêpe with a round neckline, short sleeves and lace-patterned, laser-cut scalloped trims at the cuffs and hem.
Cropped bandeau top in a patterned weave with a silicone trim at the top and wide smocking at the back. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a decorative tie detail at the front.

Ankle-length trousers in soft cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist with grosgrain ties that can be tied into a bow at the front, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets.
